//@version=6
indicator("QQQ signal Alert Window Strategy - main plot (modified)", overlay=true)

// ===== 参数 =====
sell_threshold = input.float(2.5, "做空窗口开启阈值 (signal ≥)", step=0.1)
sma_length = input.int(30, "VIX比率SMA长度", minval=1)
use_vix_filter = input.bool(true, "启用VIX过滤")

// ===== 数据源 =====
vix  = request.security("CBOE:VIX", "D", close, barmerge.gaps_on, barmerge.lookahead_on)
vix3m = request.security("CBOE:VIX3M", "D", close, barmerge.gaps_on, barmerge.lookahead_on)
vix_ratio = (na(vix3m) or vix3m == 0) ? na : vix / vix3m
vix_ratio_sma = ta.sma(vix_ratio, sma_length)

// ===== 信号数据（数组加载）=====
var dates = array.new_int()
var vals  = array.new_float()


// ========== 数据加载函数 ==========
f_load_dates() =>
    array.clear(dates)
    array.concat(dates,     array.concat(vals, ,-1.8118211,-0.97533915,-1.8991215,-1.8256309,-1.1117783,-2.2388712,-1.7168476,-3.2219676,-2.9801112,-2.2426416,-2.8956406,-1.6105036,-1.214686,-1.9121917,-1.1926828,-1.2748115,-1.0430515,-0.024979249,0.22807814,-0.60058624,-0.82317239,-1.9430064,-1.7817745,-1.3058026,-0.88439572,-3.1487807,-5.2086489,-3.764953,-3.9172026,1.0968057,-0.73797963,0.094656451,0.37449359,0.40163829,-0.93138813,-0.87296955,-1.9120496,-0.63658575,0.35728125,1.4820372,1.8474944,1.7359901,1.9250595,1.7775208,2.1809446,2.6382698,2.2725547,1.7676629,1.8212566,2.1250121,2.0035714,3.442597,3.7252281,3.6745976,3.422997,3.3282034,3.0852617,2.7456949,1.9052419,1.8131687,1.2766054,2.1200949,1.7921875,1.7020909,1.4615782,1.6796228,1.8791868,1.8704078,1.3948686,1.6997022,1.6709168,1.8327149,1.5442107,1.5586512,0.91464172,1.4349213,0.93620437,0.86456949,0.6162331,0.98684141,1.5359016,1.5325606,1.8061842,1.7783164,1.911903,1.4076054,1.6136981,1.9544035,1.5103486,1.448151,1.6384016,1.489907,1.304053,1.3788928,1.3227965,1.2554412,1.5075994,1.3488705,1.4769799,1.164034,1.2779805,1.2806174,1.319747,1.3849413,1.2231717,1.1953783,0.86328161,-0.027922232,0.73496045,0.39693552,0.89344818,0.9701999,1.3039147,1.1123036,1.5523317,1.4735525,1.3379895,1.055669,0.99012229,0.3479657,0.06936953,0.5155115,0.3651658,0.51635892,0.55143493))








// 一次性加载信号
var bool _loaded = false
if barstate.isfirst and not _loaded
    f_load_dates()
    f_load_vals()
    _loaded := true

// ===== 当前信号 =====
lenD = array.size(dates)
lenV = array.size(vals)
cur_ts = timestamp("America/New_York", year, month, dayofmonth, 0, 0)

var int idx = -1
var float sig_today = na
if (lenD > 0) and (lenD == lenV)
    if (idx < 0) or (cur_ts < array.get(dates, math.max(idx, 0)))
        idx := -1
    while (idx + 1 < lenD) and (array.get(dates, idx + 1) <= cur_ts)
        idx += 1
    is_exact = (idx >= 0) and (array.get(dates, idx) == cur_ts)
    sig_today := is_exact ? array.get(vals, idx) : na

// ===== 状态变量 =====
var bool alert_window_active = false
var int position = 1  // 初始多头

prev_sig = sig_today[1]
prev_ratio = vix_ratio[1]
prev_sma = vix_ratio_sma[1]
is_new_day = ta.change(time("D")) != 0

// ===== 警戒窗口（只针对做空）=====
if not na(prev_sig)
    if not alert_window_active and prev_sig >= sell_threshold
        alert_window_active := true
    else if alert_window_active and prev_sig < 0
        alert_window_active := false

// ===== 交易逻辑 =====
if is_new_day and not na(prev_sig)
    // 做空逻辑（需窗口）
    if alert_window_active and (use_vix_filter ? prev_ratio > prev_sma : true) and position != -1
        position := -1

    // 做多逻辑（无窗口）
    else if prev_sig < 0 and (use_vix_filter ? prev_ratio < prev_sma : true) and position != 1
        position := 1

// ===== 可视化 =====
bgcolor(position == 1 ? color.new(color.green, 85) :
       position == -1 ? color.new(color.red, 85) :
       na)



// 做多入场点：绿色三角
long_entry  = is_new_day and position == 1 and position[1] != 1
plotshape(long_entry, location=location.belowbar, color=color.new(color.green, 0),
          style=shape.triangleup, size=size.small)

// 做空入场点：红色倒三角
short_entry = is_new_day and position == -1 and position[1] != -1
plotshape(short_entry, location=location.abovebar, color=color.new(color.red, 0),
          style=shape.triangledown, size=size.small)
